name: Add-on Popularity
query:
SELECT
    addon.item AS "Add-on:Link/Airplane Ticket Add-on Type:200",
    COUNT(addon.item) AS "Sold Count:Int:120"
FROM
    `tabAirplane Ticket Add-on Item` addon
JOIN
    `tabAirplane Ticket` ticket
    ON addon.parent = ticket.name
WHERE
    ticket.docstatus = 1
GROUP BY
    addon.item
ORDER BY
    COUNT(addon.item) DESC;
